greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(A269360(n)) = 2*a(n), a(A250469(1+n)) = 1 + 2*a(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1, after which for even n, a(n) = 2*a(A268674(n-1)), for odd n, a(n) = 1 + 2*a(A268674(n)-1).
xref: Differs from similarly constructed A245605 for the first time at n=21, where a(21)=19, instead of 15.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 13 2016
